value.string:
source, destination, source_section, destination_section = context.getSource(), context.getDestination(), context.getSourceSection(), context.getDestinationSection()
 
 if not(source is None and destination is None and source_section is None and destination_section is None):
 # nothing to do
 return
 
 movement_list = context.getMovementList()
 assert len(movement_list) == 1
 software_instance = movement_list[0].getAggregateValue(portal_type='Software Instance')
 
 sale_order_line = software_instance.getAggregateRelatedValue(portal_type='Sale Order Line')
 if sale_order_line is None:
 hosting_subscription = context.getPortalObject().portal_catalog.getResultValue(uid=software_instance.SoftwareInstance_getRootHostingSubscriptionUid())
 sale_order_line = hosting_subscription.getAggregateRelatedValue(portal_type='Sale Order Line')
 
 sale_order = sale_order_line.getParentValue()
 
 context.setSource(sale_order.getSource())
 context.setDestination(sale_order.getDestination())
 context.setSourceSection(sale_order.getSourceSection())
 context.setDestinationSection(sale_order.getDestinationSection())
